question:
Which of the following statements are correct?
1. Second Round Table Conference was held in London from 7 September 1931 to 1 December 1931.Â 
2. Karachi Session of Indian National Congress was presided by Sardar Patel.
3. Execution of Bhagat Singh took place on 24th March 1931.
4. Gandhi - Irwin Pact was signed in 1931.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: All the statements are correct. Second Round Table Conference was held in London from 7 September 1931 to 1 December 1931. Karachi Session of Indian National Congress was presided by Sardar Patel. Execution of Bhagat Singh took place on 24th March 1931. Gandhi - Irwin Pact was signed in 1931.
